name: Motorvision
overview: The motor Vision Group is one of Europe’s leading producers of automotive Program content. It has to have a program archive with more than 20,000 hours digital footage from different areas of the motor world, the daily grows. The media group combining TV production, TV channels (dt. / Engl.), Online platforms, Print magazine and program archiving, program and channel distribution under one roof. For motor Vision Group includes five companies: the German Car TV program GmbH (operates the channel on Sky TV and Motorvision Motorvision HD on OSN), the MV Media GmbH (operates the online platform and www.motorvision.de www.motorvision.com and publishes the magazine “Motor Vision - The magazine for the automotive fascination” out), the Industry Media GmbH (TV and film production company), the MV International GmbH (responsible for the international program sales and TV stations) and the Motorvision Asia Ltd.. (Asia office of the group). More details at www.motorvisiongroup.com.
